items.name: The Modifyers Wiki
items.title: The Modifyers Wiki
items.headline: Welcome to The Modifyers Wiki
items.desc: The Modifyers is an animated short created by Chris Reccardi and Lynne Naylor. It was initially a pilot pitched to television giant Nickelodeon, however, it was rejected by the publisher. It features Agent Xero and her sidekick Mole attempting to thwart the efforts of Baron Vain and his legion of henchmen, such as Rat.
